translation.de: -Was machen sie tagsüber? -Sie schließen sich in dunkle Särge ein.

translation.en: Typically, the vampires will group their coffins
translation.de: Vampire verstecken oft mehrere Särge an einem Ort.

translation.en: in a secret and secure location called a nest.
translation.de: Vampire verstecken oft mehrere Särge an einem Ort. Das nennt man ein Nest.

translation.en: A nest.
A vampire can be killed with a silver or wooden stake to the…
translation.de: Man tötet sie mit einem silbernen oder hölzernen Pflock…

translation.en: -To the head. Chu-hoo. -…heart. They'll disintegrate.
translation.de: Über den Kopf. Nein, ins Herz.

translation.en: You know those little round cookies that don't taste like anything they give out at church?
translation.de: Kennt ihr diese geschmacklosen Kekse, die man in der Kirche kriegt?

translation.en: You mean the Eucharist?
You little heathen. If you was at church once in a while, you'd know that.
translation.de: Geh mal in die Kirche, dann weißt du Bescheid.

translation.en: Put one of those Eucharists in a vampire's mouth, and he's toast.
translation.de: Wenn ein Vampir eine Hostie isst, ist er hinüber.

translation.en: Also garlic. What about that?
-Nah, that's not a thing. -Yes, a thing.
Garlic is a vampire repellent.
Same with the crucifix.
Holy water is a repellent as well,
but you can also use it as a vampire detector
translation.de: Man kann Weihwasser als Vampirdetektor nutzen,

translation.en: because holy water boils when a vampire is close.
translation.de: denn es kocht, wenn ein Vampir nahe ist.

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
-Vampires. -Nothing.
Y'all really shouldn't be messing with that kinda stuff.
-[door chimes] -[Tony] Welcome to Primo Bodega. Big sexy. [speaking Spanish]
translation.de: Willkommen in der Primo Bodega, Großer.

translation.en: That's it. It's happening right in front of us. A vampire can only enter your place if he's invited.
translation.de: Seht ihr? Ein Vampir kann nur eintreten, wenn er eingeladen wurde.

translation.en: Tony let the vampire in last night when he said, "Welcome to Primo Bodega."
translation.de: Tony ließ den Vampir gestern rein, als er "Willkommen" sagte.

translation.en: [whispers] Right, right. Okay, okay. They can't enter bodega.
translation.de: Ok. Sie können in die Bodega.

translation.en: -All right. -No, no.
[quietly] They need an invitation to enter,
and it's not only a bodega. It can be like a house or something.
translation.de: Dann können sie in jedes Gebäude.

translation.en: A message from me. You tell him it's open season on all suckheads.
translation.de: NICHT EINLADEN! …eine Botschaft. Die Jagd auf Blutsauger ist eröffnet.

translation.en: I don't like that look. You're about to say something stupid.
translation.de: Du siehst aus, als würdest du gleich etwas Dummes sagen.

translation.en: We are not going in there.
It's daytime.
Nothing to worry about. They're all asleep, right?
I've gotta be out of my mind.
Come on, guys. We need proof. We got this. We're Blades.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Beweise. Wir schaffen es. Wir sind Blades.

translation.en: -Hello. -May I help you?
Yes, I'd like to talk to your manager about a sponsorship opportunity.
translation.de: Ich möchte mit Ihrem Manager über Sponsoring reden.

translation.en: Seriously?
Here.
Is this your business card?
It's for charity.
Are you insane?
translation.de: Bist du irre? Wir müssen sofort hier weg.

translation.en: -We need to get out of here right now. -I'm looking for evidence.
translation.de: Bist du irre? Wir müssen sofort hier weg. Ich suche Beweise.

translation.en: You know, I think you're putting way too much faith in shit that he read in a comic book.
translation.de: Du vertraust auf irgendwelchen Scheiß, den er in einem Comic gelesen hat.

translation.en: It's a graphic novel.
[whispering] Shut up.
Come on.
He'll be with you in a moment.
He will?
The afternoon sun can be murder.
Frank Polidori. Pleasure to meet you.
You too.
Step into my office.
So, what can I do for you boys?
translation.de: Was kann ich für euch tun?

translation.en: Well, we're, um…
doing this event to benefit Tony's bodega, and…
translation.de: Wir machen eine Veranstaltung für Tonys Bodega.

translation.en: -We need some sponsorship-- -[Frank] I'm gonna stop you right there.
How's $2,000 sound?
-You serious? -[Frank] You know, you're right.
Let's make it three.
You know, Murnau… is very committed to making the Bronx the best place it can be for all of us.
translation.de: Murnau setzt sich dafür ein, die Bronx zu einem guten Ort zu machen.

translation.en: That's very thoughtful of you.
To put it bluntly,
this place is a forgotten area.
Every last one of you could disappear,
and no one would even notice.
Although, I gotta say, not everyone appreciates what we're trying to do here.
translation.de: Leider wissen nicht alle zu schätzen, was wir hier tun.

translation.en: Would you believe someone glued a flyer
translation.de: Es hat sogar jemand so einen Flyer

translation.en: just like this to our sign outside the courthouse?
translation.de: auf unser Schild am Gerichtsgebäude geklebt.

translation.en: You boys wouldn't know anything about that now, would you?
No, no, no.
[Miguel] Luis?
-What's going on here? -[Miguel] He has low blood sugar.
-Maybe we should call his mom. -Nobody leaves this room.
translation.de: -Wir rufen seine Mutter. -Keiner verlässt den Raum.

translation.en: But he's gonna…
What are you guys doing here?
[gasps] Oh, my gosh. Are you okay?
translation.de: Mein Gott, geht es dir gut?

translation.en: Well…
I'm suddenly feeling much better.
translation.de: Es geht mir schon viel besser.

translation.en: We were just talking to Mr. Polidori about sponsoring the block party, and--
translation.de: Wir baten Mr. Polidori um Sponsoring für die Blockparty.

translation.en: You really should. These kids are great.
translation.de: Das sollten Sie tun. Die Jungs sind prima.

translation.en: We have an appointment. I'm sorry. My mind is…
translation.de: Wir hatten einen Termin, tut mir leid.

translation.en: Okay, well, thank you. Nice seeing you. Nice meeting you.
translation.de: Ok, danke. Es war uns eine Freude.

translation.en: We really must be going.
Um… [chuckles] Thank you for the very generous donation.
[smacks lips] It'll really help. Oh.
-[Bobby] Go! Go! -[Miguel] Watch out!
What the hell is this?
A massive vampire nest.
Thirteen floors. Twelve coffins per floor.
-That's 300 and-- -One hundred fifty-six vampires.
-[Gladys] Bobby! -Close enough.
What?
Uh-uh. Don't you talk to me like that.
translation.de: Nein, so redest du nicht mit mir.

translation.en: I ought to smack you upside the head.
And you, too.
You ain't fooling nobody.
I know what you doing.
I'mma check your cookies.
[Bobby] Where you going, Mom?
I'm going to see that man at the real estate company.
He came by last night, wanted to know if we were selling!
translation.de: Er fragte gestern, ob wir verkaufen.

translation.en: Uh, you can't talk to him.
translation.de: Sie dürfen nicht mit ihm reden.

translation.en: What the hell you doing?
-Don't go there, Ma. -He's… he's a really bad man.
translation.de: -Geh nicht hin. -Er ist ein böser Mensch.

translation.en: Of course he is. He's in real estate,
but as long as his money is also real, -I'm gon' hear him out. -Why?
translation.de: -Aber für so viel Geld höre ich ihm zu. -Warum?

translation.en: Where'd you get that hat?
translation.de: Wo hast du die Mütze her?

translation.en: Bought it.
Psss. Henny better not have given that to you.
I see what he's trying to do. Trying to pull you down the same road to hell as your daddy.
translation.de: Er will, dass du den Weg einschlägst wie dein Daddy.

translation.en: This Frank Polidori, he's gon' get us out of this house,
translation.de: Frank Polidori wird uns hier rausholen

translation.en: keep you away from that life.
translation.de: und dich vor diesem Leben bewahren.

translation.en: [Miguel] Miss Gladys, please trust us.
translation.de: Miss Gladys, bitte vertrauen Sie uns.

translation.en: Don't go there.
But we gon' leave this mess before you screw up.
translation.de: Du wirst hier keinen Mist bauen.

translation.en: Y'all can go back to your nudie search. Hmm.
-[exhales] -So, Henny gave you that hat?
So?
There are plans for dozens of buildings here.
I… I say we take all this to the cops.
-We can't. -He's right.
-Not enough evidence. -Not what I thought you'd say.
If you don't already believe in vampires, you're not gonna believe in this.
translation.de: Wer nicht an Vampire glaubt, wird es nicht glauben.

translation.en: We need something more.
We need something no one can deny.
We need to find the nest.
Also, I stole this, so we should chill with the cop talk.
translation.de: Das ist geklaut, also keine Bullen.

translation.en: Don't touch that.
Why isn't your phone on vibrate?
Who are you?
What's poppin', y'all? This is GloTV. It looks like they got things started
translation.de: Was geht? Hier GloTV. Beim Gerichtsgebäude sind massenhaft Umzugshelfer.

translation.en: at the courthouse. They got mad movers, and it looks hella fancy in there.
translation.de: Beim Gerichtsgebäude sind massenhaft Umzugshelfer. Alles sehr elegant. Die haben sogar Kronleuchter.

translation.en: Like, they got chandeliers. Let's check it out.
translation.de: Alles sehr elegant. Die haben sogar Kronleuchter.

translation.en: Excuse me. What's in those boxes?
translation.de: Entschuldigung, was ist in den Kisten?

translation.en: [mover] Uh, Sub-Zeros.
[Gloria] They trying to tell me these big-ass boxes are Sub-Zero fridges.
translation.de: In diesen riesigen Kisten sind also Kühlschränke.

translation.en: Damn, these condos are gonna be nice as hell.
Let me guess. They ain't refrigerators.
translation.de: Lasst mich raten: Das sind keine Kühlschränke.

translation.en: I think we just found the nest.
[Gloria] Yo, am I bugging, or do these boxes look like coffins?
translation.de: Die Kisten sehen aus wie Särge.

translation.en: Come on.
Yo, it's locked.
-[whispers] Hey, check out the footprints. -[Bobby] Word, bro.
[Miguel] This is it. This is definitely it.
This is bad. This is definitely bad.
Can we please… can we please just go?
Can we just get our asses outta here?
Don't do it, man. Don't--
And we're prying the coffins open.
Seems unnecessary.
-Told you. -We got it. Can we just go?
This is the same dude who killed Slim. I remember his stupid-ass clothes.
translation.de: Der Typ hat Slim getötet. Ich erkenne seine Klamotten.

translation.en: -[Luis] Go! -Oh, my God!
-Go! -[roars]
What?
Get out!
-Open the door! -[vampire growls]
[Miguel] Go!
[Luis] Go! Go!
Yo. We got 'em.
Yo, Bobby, how you not mute your phone? You almost killed us in there.
translation.de: Schalte dein Handy stumm. Du hättest uns fast umgebracht.

translation.en: You three are in deep shit.
translation.de: Ihr drei steckt in der Scheiße.

translation.en: Great plan, Lil Mayor. I told you cops wouldn't help for shit.
translation.de: Hab ich doch gesagt, dass die Bullen einen Scheiß machen.

translation.en: Excuse me?
Um, Sanders, it sounds like they want to go to juvie.
translation.de: Sanders, die wollen in den Jugendknast.

translation.en: We expected more from you, Lil Mayor.
translation.de: Von dir hätten wir mehr erwartet.

translation.en: What are we doing here?
We need to see if Mr. Polidori's gonna press charges on you three.
translation.de: Schauen, ob Mr. Polidori Anklage erhebt.

translation.en: -Could this day get any worse? -Yes.
What is wrong with you? Huh?
What's poppin'? It's your girl Gloria. We are live and at the scene,
translation.de: Hier ist eure Gloria, live vor Ort.

translation.en: so let me give you all the deets.
Lil Mayor and his little friends got caught up with 5-0 for trespassing.
translation.de: Lil Mayor und seine kleinen Freunde wurden hoppgenommen.

translation.en: Such fine boys, aren't they?
His mom had been on him about some dirty-ass underwear,
translation.de: Seine Mama schimpfte über dreckige Unterhosen,

translation.en: and now he's in the back of a police car.
I bet this was your idea, huh?
You broke in. How could you do this? You know how hard I work?
translation.de: Wie kannst du da einbrechen? Ich arbeite so hart!

translation.en: This man got some real crazy Illuminati conspiracy theories
translation.de: Dieser Typ hat ein paar irre Illuminaten-Verschwörungstheorien

translation.en: to drop with him and his boys, and I'm ready for it.
translation.de: mit seinen Jungs zu teilen, und ich bin bereit.

translation.en: Lil Mayor's about to say wild shit. Let's go see what he say.
translation.de: Lil Mayor wird wilden Kram erzählen.

translation.en: Okay, I know how this looks, but just trust me.
translation.de: Es sieht seltsam aus, aber vertrauen Sie mir.

translation.en: Everything will make sense after you see this.
translation.de: Schauen Sie sich dieses Video an.

translation.en: See that?
That's the vampire nest.
Inside the courthouse.
Now, brace yourselves. This is the part when I open up the coffin.
translation.de: Achtung, gleich öffne ich den Sarg.

translation.en: [Luis] Can we please… can we please just go?
-Uhh, what we supposed to be seeing? -[phone ringing on recording]
-Vampires. -[crowd] What?
-Vampires? -What?
[man] Come on.
-That's wild, bro. -Lil Mayor, what you smoking, man?
translation.de: Irre. Lil Mayor, was rauchst du? Hast du mehr?

translation.en: -You got some more? -[crowd laughing]
translation.de: Lil Mayor, was rauchst du? Hast du mehr?

translation.en: I don't understand.
Vampires don't have souls.
They don't have a reflection.
You can't see them in mirrors, photos, or videos.
translation.de: Weder in Spiegeln, auf Fotos oder Videos.

translation.en: Know what? Forget the video. We have their plans to build deadly vampire nests all over this neighborhood.
translation.de: Egal. Wir haben ihre Pläne, Vampirnester im Viertel zu errichten.

translation.en: Have a look at this.
Where'd you get this?
Okay, we may have borrowed it,
translation.de: Ok, wir haben es vielleicht ausgeborgt.

translation.en: but I'd gladly give it back to Mr. Polidori if…
translation.de: Ich gebe es Mr. Polidori gern zurück. Aber nur, wenn er rauskommt

translation.en: and only if he comes out here
and proves he's not a vampire.
translation.de: und zeigt, dass er kein Vampir ist.

translation.en: Ah, kids.
They have the most wild imaginations.
I caught these three trespassing at the courthouse,
and they confessed to stealing your file.
translation.de: und haben Ihnen die Mappe gestohlen.

translation.en: [Tony] Hey, hey, hold on a second.
I can vouch for these kids, bro. They're good kids.
translation.de: Ich kenne die drei. Es sind gute Jungs.

translation.en: They were just mixed up with some crazy vampire idea. That's all.
translation.de: Sie haben nur ein paar Vampirfantasien.

translation.en: Well, the file has been returned. I suppose no harm was done.
translation.de: Die Mappe ist wieder da, niemand hat Schaden erlitten.

translation.en: Right, boys?
No need to make this a legal matter. [woman] Thank you so much.
We're so sorry. -We don't know what got into our boys. -Boys will be boys.
translation.de: -Es tut uns sehr leid. -So sind Jungs halt.

translation.en: What is wrong with you? Are you crazy?
translation.de: Was ist los? Bist du irre?

translation.en: I bet this was all your idea. You're gonna end up like your daddy.
translation.de: War das deine Idee? Du endest wie dein Daddy.

translation.en: Who you looking at? Answer me!
Come on. Let's go.
[officer] Thank you.
Hey, hey, hey, Carmen. [speaking Spanish]
You let him watch Blade, didn't you? Blade? What's that?
translation.de: -Hat er bei dir Blade geschaut? -Blade? Was ist das?

translation.en: I am Blade! Vampires…
watch out!
He paid for it.
So that's how he's getting these crazy ideas?
translation.de: Daher hat er die verrückten Ideen?

translation.en: You're not going to that bodega ever again.
translation.de: Du gehst nie wieder in die Bodega.

translation.en: What? No, no, Mom.
-Ma, Tony didn't do anything. -[speaking Spanish]
Go with your mother. Listen to her. She knows best, all right?
translation.de: Deine Mutter weiß, was das Beste ist.

translation.en: -I know best. -Forget the vampire stuff.
Commander.
We're going to church to set you right. And clean up this room!
translation.de: Wir gehen nachher in die Kirche. Räum dein Zimmer auf!

translation.en: Yo, open that gate.
[Frank] Henny, my man. Thanks for meeting me.
translation.de: Henny. Danke, dass Sie mich treffen.

translation.en: What's this business opportunity you got for me?
translation.de: Sie wollen mir ein Geschäft anbieten?

translation.en: So, my employer has become concerned
that people in the neighborhood aren't responding… expeditiously enough to our financial proposals.
translation.de: Die Bewohner des Viertels reagieren nicht schnell genug auf unsere Angebote.

translation.en: So, I need you to make some…
let's just call it "noise" in the neighborhood.
translation.de: dass Sie Chaos im Viertel stiften.

translation.en: Disturbances significant enough
to give the last holdouts the push they need to sell.
translation.de: damit auch die Unwilligen an uns verkaufen.

translation.en: Yeah. I ain't interested in any police attention.
translation.de: Ich will keine Aufmerksamkeit der Polizei.

translation.en: 'Cause it would negatively impact your business. I understand that. I can dig it.
translation.de: Ihr Geschäft würde darunter leiden, sicher. Das verstehe ich, klar.

translation.en: However, what I'm prepared to offer you tonight…
translation.de: Aber ich werde Ihnen ein Angebot machen.

translation.en: is more money for a couple of days' work than you've made in your entire life.
translation.de: Mehr Geld für ein paar Tage, als Sie je verdient haben.

translation.en: That's right.
Additionally, there's a matter of a small piece of personal property
translation.de: Zudem gibt es einen persönlichen Gegenstand,

translation.en: that's been stolen from us by a group of neighborhood boys.
translation.de: der uns von Jungs aus dem Viertel gestohlen wurde.

translation.en: We'd like the stolen items returned
and the perpetrators…
eliminated.
[operator] You--
Yo, why you ignoring me?
-What? I called you. -[Miguel] Luis?
Yeah. Listen. I figured it out. Dude is their familiar.
translation.de: Ja, hör zu. Der Typ ist ihr Vertrauter.

translation.en: Who is their what?
Frank. The creepy real estate guy. He's the vampires' familiar.
translation.de: Frank, der fiese Makler, ist der Vampirvertraute.

translation.en: -What is that? Like, a sun vampire? -[Luis] No.
A familiar is a human servant who protects his undead master during the daylight hours.
translation.de: Ein Vertrauter ist ein Mensch, der tagsüber Untote beschützt.

translation.en: He does a vampire's bidding in exchange for eventually becoming a vampire himself.
translation.de: Er dient dem Vampir, um irgendwann selbst Vampir zu werden.

translation.en: He's making all the deals in the daytime while the vampires sleep in the nest.
translation.de: Er schließt alle Verträge ab, während die Vampire schlafen?

translation.en: -Exactly. -[Carmen] Miguel!
-You going to church tonight? -[Luis] Yes.
Titi's convinced I'm possessed by el diablo.
translation.de: Titi meint, dass ich vom Diablo besessen bin.

translation.en: El diablo! That's right. That's why he's going to church tonight.
translation.de: Diablo, genau. Darum gehen wir in die Kirche.

translation.en: God will save him. The Lord will help him.
translation.de: Gott wird ihn retten und ihm helfen.

translation.en: Told you.
See you there. I got a plan.
translation.de: Bis dann. Ich habe einen Plan.

translation.en: [Bobby] Come on, man.
Sup, little man?
Hey, look, you better go before my mom spots you.
translation.de: Verschwinde besser, bevor meine Mom dich sieht.

translation.en: I got something. Set you and your moms up real nice.
translation.de: Ich kann dich und deine Mom reich machen.

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't know. -I'm trying to help you, bruh.
translation.de: -Tja, ich weiß nicht. -Ich will euch helfen, Kumpel.

translation.en: You run out the money your pops left, kicked out of school.
translation.de: Papas Geld ist alle, du wurdest der Schule verwiesen.

translation.en: You gon' keep playing with your little friends, or you gon' finally grow up, be the man of the house, get some respect?
translation.de: Willst du weiter rumspielen oder endlich als Mann respektiert werden?

translation.en: -What? -Meet me and Luis at church right now.
translation.de: Was ist? -Triff uns bei der Kirche. -Nein.

translation.en: -No. -I have a plan to take out these vampires.
translation.de: -Triff uns bei der Kirche. -Nein. Ich hab einen Plan, aber wir brauchen dich.

translation.en: But we need you!
translation.de: Ich hab einen Plan, aber wir brauchen dich.

translation.en: [Henny] Last chance. I ain't asking again.
translation.de: Letzte Chance. Ich frage nicht noch mal.

translation.en: -[Miguel] Yo, is that Henny? -That your boy Miguel?
translation.de: Ist das Henny? Ist das Miguel? Lass mich mit ihm reden.

translation.en: Let me holla at him.
translation.de: Ist das Miguel? Lass mich mit ihm reden.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -[Miguel] No! Bobby, don't!
-You know how this is gonna end with him. -[Bobby] End with him?
translation.de: Du weißt, wie es enden wird. Mit ihm besser als mit dir.

translation.en: What about with you?
translation.de: Mit ihm besser als mit dir.

translation.en: In the last day, you got me into more shit than Henny ever could.
translation.de: Du bringst mir mehr Ärger als Henny.

translation.en: I'm done with all this. And I'm done with you!
translation.de: Ich habe die Schnauze voll von euch.

translation.en: [Luis] Yo, Miguel.
-Bobby coming? -No. He's with Henny.
But, uh… we can do this without him.
translation.de: Aber wir kriegen das ohne ihn hin.

translation.en: And what is it we're doing?
Well, well, well…
lost lambs returning to the flock.
I don't see you two at Thursday mass very often.
translation.de: Ich sehe euch nicht oft bei der Messe.

translation.en: It's tough with our responsibilities in the community and so forth and--
translation.de: Es ist schwer, weil wir viel für die Gemeinde tun und so.

translation.en: Right, right, right. And where's the other one? Hm?
The one that likes to start melees and fraternizes with known drug dealers?
translation.de: Der sich gern prügelt und mit Dealern abhängt?

translation.en: He couldn't make it.
So, can we, uh… please go?
By all means.
I'll be watching you two.
Closely.
What are we doing?
Hey, how you doing? Welcome to Primo Bodega.
How can I help you?
Is this the famous bodega Lil Mayor's trying to save?
translation.de: Diese Bodega will Lil Mayor retten?

translation.en: Yes, it is. You know Miguel?
-Doesn't everybody? -[Tony] Yeah, it's true.
Actually, I want to help out with the block party.
translation.de: Ich will bei der Blockparty helfen.

translation.en: I was thinking of making maple scones.
-Maple scones? -[Vivian] Yeah.
Yeah, that's a dope idea.
-[chuckles] Is it lame? -No, nah.
Maple scones are dope.
[chuckles] Is, uh… is he around?
Miguel? Nah, man, that boy is bugging.
translation.de: Miguel? Nein, er ist auf Achse.

translation.en: I taught him way better than that. I practically raised them boys, man.
translation.de: Ich habe die Jungs mehr oder weniger aufgezogen.

translation.en: -I didn't know that. -Yeah, man.
When their parents were working, they were here in the bodega, hanging out,
translation.de: Sie hingen ständig hier in der Bodega ab.

translation.en: doing homework, playing video games, staying out of trouble.
Are you a baseball fan?
Oh, this right here?
This is the bat that Sammy Sosa, the pride of San Pedro de Macorís,
translation.de: Das hier ist der Schläger, mit dem Sammy Sosa aus San Pedro de Macorís

translation.en: used to hit 60 home runs in one season.
-Wow. -Which had only been done four times
translation.de: Das gab es bis dahin nur viermal.

translation.en: in the history of baseball. You know how old baseball is?
translation.de: Das gab es bis dahin nur viermal. Und Baseball ist verdammt alt.

translation.en: -It's old as shit. -[chuckles]
But that was before he started bleaching his skin, looking like Count Chocula
translation.de: Dann bleichte er seine Haut und sah aus wie einer der Blutsauger, die Miguel im Viertel zu sehen glaubt.

translation.en: and one of these vampires that Miguel thinks is in the neighborhood, sucking on people's necks.
translation.de: und sah aus wie einer der Blutsauger, die Miguel im Viertel zu sehen glaubt.

translation.en: I heard about that. [Tony] Yeah.
But, yeah. Check out the store. Peruse my wares,
translation.de: Schauen Sie sich um. Begutachten Sie meine Waren.

translation.en: you know? I got some new stuff. I got some kale.
translation.de: Ich habe neue Produkte, wie Kohl.

translation.en: I got another type of kale, some flaxseeds.

translation.en: at all.

two…
